publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3510 Tavish Scott: The Draft Regional Transport Partnerships (Establishment, Constitution and Membership) (Scotland) Order 2005—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Regional Transport Partnerships (Establishment, Constitution and Membership) (Scotland) Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran*

S2M-3510 Tavish Scott: The Draft Regional Transport Partnerships (Establishment, Constitution and Membership) (Scotland) Order 2005—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Regional Transport Partnerships (Establishment, Constitution and Membership) (Scotland) Order 2005 be approved.Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran
